sentences.sContent: There is no greater thrill than to bluff a man, trap him, and outfox him.
sentences.sCn: 没有什么比虚张声势吓唬别人、让他钻入圈套并用计将他击败更加刺激了。

remMethod.val: out(出) + fox(狐狸) → 胜过狐狸 → 以机智胜过

trans.tranOther: If you outfox someone, you defeat them in some way because you are more clever than they are
